title: 'Do such mosques exist?' Britain's largest Muslim organisation confronts David Cameron over extremism plans
text: David Cameron ’s new strategy to tackle extremism is “flawed” and plans to ban people from mosques have “McCarthyist undertones”, Britain’s largest Muslim organisation has said. The Prime Minister will unveil further measures to protect
